Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about SafeKid

SafeKid uses advanced weight sensors and AI-powered motion detection to identify when a child is present in the vehicle. The system activates automatically when you exit and lock your car.

You can easily dismiss false alerts through the mobile app within 30 seconds. The system learns from your feedback to improve accuracy over time.

Yes, SafeKid operates reliably in temperatures from -20°F to 150°F (-29°C to 65°C) and includes emergency temperature alerts for dangerous conditions.

The SafeKid device battery lasts up to 6 months with normal use. You'll receive low battery notifications with plenty of time to recharge.

Absolutely. All data is encrypted end-to-end and stored locally on your device. We never sell or share your personal information with third parties.

SafeKid works with any vehicle model year 2010 or newer. Installation takes less than 10 minutes with our step-by-step guide and included mounting hardware.

Still have questions? Contact our support team for personalized assistance.
